name: Barthory Mansion
description:
Barthory mansion is a story rich puzzle mystery, taking place in a horror mansion during the Victorian era. Where you will meet an odd family who will give you tasks to do, while finding a couple hidden paths that will slowly lead you to the truth of this creepy mansion.

Features: Item Inspection

You can choose to inspect items, during this mode new interactions can be found, and some puzzles can be solved.


Dialogue
During dialogue you can choose what you want to say, depending on your choices the story will unwrap differently.

Movement and Camera

Explore a whole mansion for secrets.

Peeping

You can choose to interact with multiple objects,  peeping into walls is just one of many interactions you can make.

Narrative and Lore: During your playthrough, the protagonist will be faced with some dialogue options that may influence some character reactions and directions for the player to take.

You will also be able to find hidden locations that might bring some more insight to you and your perception of the events happening within this Mansion. Keep an eye out for any out of place item, for they might be of significance to someone.

Controls:  Controller: Keyboard:
  • In the World:
    Esc – Pauses the game / Unpauses
    E – Interacts with objects in the world
    R – Brings up player’s light
    WASD – Moves the character
    F – Open Inventory
  • During inspection:
    E – Interacts with prompts the item might have
    Q – Returns to the previous menu/exists inspection or menus
    R – Resets the position of the item
